commit message: Fixed no posts loading if the full first page was filtered, Fixed profile bug
Fixed app crashing with no internet connection
Fixed crash when collapsing all comments before they're loaded
Fixed crash when visiting profile with no connection
Fixed some bugs on the profile screen, Fixed flair selector from previous sub showing in current sub
Fixed vote status if comment was voted in prior to opening, Fixed some bugs
Fixed scrollbar inset margin in SubmissionsView

Merge pull request #1573 from Nxt3/post-stuff

Fixed scrollbar inset margin in SubmissionsView
Don't allow collapsing the currently editing comment, Fixed some bugs
Move progressbar with toolbar scroll in comments
Lots of lint cleanup and some bug fixes
Added option to autohide the comment nav bar, Show comment count in fastscroll selector in comments, Some bug fixes
Add space between author and tags in inbox
Fixed layout bug in sync settings
